place.name: ROUDHAM
place.gazetteerText: ROUDHAM, a parish in Wayland district, Norfolk; near the Peddar-way, 2 miles N W by W of Harling-Road r. station, and 6½ N E of Thetford. Post-town, Thetford. Acres, 2,085. Real property, £1,036. Pop., 132. Houses, 24. The manor belongs to Sir T. G. Sebright. The living is a vicarage in the diocese of Norwich. Value, not reported. Patron, Sir T. G. Sebright. The church has long been in ruins. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
